attributes.action: We want Parliament to assist in the capture and trial of Joseph Kony.
attributes.additional_details:
We want Parliament to assist in the capture of Joseph Kony. This does not necessarily have to be through military means, putting British solders on the front line, but could take a variety of forms.
These include such things as helping the people fighting against Kony with training, specialised technology and aid.
Our country may not be at its strongest economically at the moment, but that is no reason to allow the terrible things that Kony and his army do to carry on.
